name: Bombjammers
description: Bombjammers is a (1-4 player) sports game Inspired by the Neo Geo classic Windjammers, and tribute to the awesome personalities of Giantbomb.com. Featuring the amazing artwork of Michael Lee Lunsford and music of Midnight Brown. It's currently in pre-alpha. For all the latest news and progress visit my blog, website, or twitter.
